content: ## Remove access to a credential To unshare a credential: 1. From the left menu, select either **Overview** or a project. 2. Select **Credentials** to see a list of your credentials. 3. Select the credential you want to unshare. 4. Select **Sharing**. 5. Select **trash icon**![Trash icon](/_images/common-icons/delete-node.png){.off-glb} on the user or project you want to remove from the list of shared users and projects. 6. Select **Save** to apply the changes.
